title: Turkey, Asparagus and Goat Cheese Penne

ingredients.content: 1 tsp salt, plus extra to season
8 oz cooked turkey meat, cubed or pulled
8 oz asparagus, cut in pieces (1 in.), woody ends removed
1 lemon, thin peel only, no pith

preparations.content: Place water into mixing bowl and bring to a boil <b>15 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>.
Add salt and dried pasta through hole in mixing bowl lid, place Varoma dish (dish only, no lid) instead of measuring cup onto mixing bowl lid and cook <b>5 min/Varoma//speed <b>.

Weigh turkey and asparagus into Varoma dish, secure Varoma lid and steam <b>6 min/Varoma//speed <b>, or until pasta is cooked to your liking. Remove Varoma, set aside and keep turkey and asparagus warm. Drain pasta, transfer to a large bowl and set aside. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Place garlic, lemon peel, chili flakes and parsley into mixing bowl and chop <b>10 sec/speed 8<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and chop a further <b>5 sec/speed 8<b>.

Transfer to bowl with reserved pasta, drizzle with olive oil, season with salt and add reserved turkey and asparagus. Top with tomatoes, goat cheese and arugula. Stir with spatula to combine, garnish with lemon zest and serve.

hintsAndTricks: Before serving, top with 4 oz green or black olives and/or 4 oz roasted red peppers, cut into strips. Stir with spatula to combine.
